15.m: Jesus said to him, 'I am the way, and the truth, and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me.' - John 14:6 (ESV)

l.q: What kind of relationship does Jesus have with the Father?
l.a: The Father is Jesus' authority. The Father is doing his work through Jesus. The Father is in Jesus and Jesus is in the Father. Jesus is our way to the Father.

l.q: Who will do the works of Jesus when He goes to the Father?
l.a: Those who believe in Jesus will do the works that he's been doing.

l.q: What did Jesus promise to those who will do His works?
l.a: Jesus promised those who believe in Him and are doing His works that they can approach him and ask anything in His name, and He will do it, so that the Father may be glorified in the Son.

15.p: Lord Jesus, I pray that you will continue to equip me with wisdom from your word. Please guard my heart against false teachings that I may see and hear from around me. But may I be a light instead to those who need to hear the truth of the gospel.
